title: Android 13 DP1: Guest profiles can now access installed apps from the main profile
content:
Android has long featured the ability to have multiple user profiles on the same device, effectively allowing someone to share a phone or tablet without allowing access to each other’s data. In Android 13, Google is adding the ability for guest profiles to get access to apps already installed on the device.

more…

The post Android 13 DP1: Guest profiles can now access installed apps from the main profile appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Android 13 is changing up guest profiles by offering device owners the ability to allow apps already installed to be on the guest profile.
